import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import './Navbar_style.css'; import './AccountPage.css'; import axios from 'axios'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; const userEmail = Cookies.get('email'); // Replace with your cookie reading logic const [userdetails, setdata] = useState([]); axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/user/${userEmail}`) .then(response => { setdata(response.data); console.log(response.data); // User data }) .catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching user data:', error); }); export const AccountPage = () => { // const userEmail = getCookieValue('email'); // Replace with your cookie reading logic const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; // For nested state handling (address fields) setdata({ ...userdetails, [name]: value }); }; return (

userdetails Page
